abstract.text: A declarative, SwiftUI-like framework for building Terminal User Interfaces in Swift.

inlineContent.text: TUIkit lets you build terminal applications using a familiar, declarative syntax inspired by SwiftUI. No ncurses, no C dependencies: pure Swift.
: 5 built-in phosphor themes with full RGB color support
: Configurable shortcut bar with context stack
: Pure Swift, no ncurses or other C libraries
